name: Wireshark
description: A network protocol analyzer that allows users to capture and interactively browse traffic on a computer network.

name: Metasploit
description: A penetration testing framework that helps security professionals find and exploit vulnerabilities in systems.

name: Nmap
description: A network scanning tool used to discover hosts and services on a computer network by sending packets and analyzing the responses.

name: Burp Suite
description: An integrated platform for performing security testing of web applications, providing tools for scanning, crawling, and exploiting vulnerabilities.

name: Kali Linux
description: A Debian-based Linux distribution aimed at advanced penetration testing and security auditing.

name: OWASP ZAP
description: An open-source web application security scanner that helps find security vulnerabilities in web applications during development and testing.

name: Splunk
description: A software platform for searching, monitoring, and analyzing machine-generated big data via a web-style interface.

name: Snort
description: An open-source intrusion detection system (IDS) and intrusion prevention system (IPS) capable of real-time traffic analysis and packet logging.
